      • checkIfTetrominoCollidesOnAxisX

        private boolean checkIfTetrominoCollidesOnAxisX(int direction)
        Method to check if the Tetromino will collide on the next move on X axis.
        Parameters:
        direction - 1 if want to check right collision, -1 if want to detect left collision.
        Returns:
        True if is going to collide, false if it's not going to collide.
        See Also:
        worldCoordinatesToBoardMatrixCoordinatesInBlocks(int[])

      • tetrominoCollidesOnBottom

        private boolean tetrominoCollidesOnBottom()
        Method to check if the Tetromino will collide on the row below with any block.
        Returns:
        True if is going to collide, false if it's not going to collide.
        See Also:
        worldCoordinatesToBoardMatrixCoordinatesInBlocks(int[])

      • tetrominoOutOfBoard

        private boolean tetrominoOutOfBoard()
        Method to check if the Tetromino is going to go out of the board.
        Returns:
        True if is going to go out, false if it's not.
        See Also:
        worldCoordinatesToBoardMatrixCoordinatesInBlocks(int[])
